about_the_game:
The confinement has begun, Loren (or whatever name you decide), a happily married and dangerously horny woman, is going through a difficult time in her sex life, and being cooped up all day at home makes her feel... Very horny!



Hard Days is an adult Visual Novel based on your choices that includes:

- Explicit sex scenes.
- More than 5000 static images and more than 200 animated scenes.
- 7 to 10 hours of gameplay
- 7 exciting days full of morbid sex, divided into morning, afternoon and evening.
- Lots of lewd scenes with several girls, orgies, lesbian sex and all kinds of naughtiness.

In Hard Days you will get to know Loren, her desires, her thoughts and her contradictions, her wish to get out of the routine! You will meet different characters, each with their own personality, and you will have to help Loren to live with them, in very... Exciting ways!
How will you get along with your in-laws? And her new neighbors? And her husband, does he really know who Loren is? Does he know what her needs?



Hard Days is a visual novel for adults, you'll put yourself in Loren's shoes, get to know how she thinks, what she wants, and help her make difficult and naughty decisions! Be careful what you choose, things won't always go Loren's way!



Keep an eye on the horny meter, it will increase according to your choices, and in certain situations you will have to make choices according to the protagonist's meter, be careful, when Loren is very horny, the choices can be difficult ;)
Make your choices at key moments so that the story continues according to what you choose. The story always goes on, but according to your choices the events will be different.



Loren is waiting for you to accompany her in her most intimate secrets! Lies, infidelities, surprises and, most importantly, sex, lots of sex!
Don't know what decision to make? No matter, you can save at any time and go back to that point so you can see the different paths your choices will lead you to.
Enjoy the hot story of Loren ( or whatever name you decide ), and her naughty antics.

Sex, lies, desire, lust and much more, in HARD DAYS!
